t = int(input())
def arrange(pie, w_pie, w_rack):
    w_pie.sort()
    w_rack.sort()
    i, j = 0, 0
    while (i < pie and j< pie):
        if w_pie[i] <= w_rack[j]:
            i += 1
            j += 1
        else:
            j += 1
    print i
    

for i in range(t):
    pie = input()
    w_pie= map(int, raw_input().split())
    w_rack = map(int, raw_input().split())
    arrange(pie,w_pie,w_rack)
